title: Terms and conditions
content: <1>The purpose of this version is to demonstrate the functionalities of the AI Assessment Tool before allowing you to download it locally to your servers and securely include your project data. If you use the Tool, you agree to abide by these General conditions as mentioned below.</1>
<1>This version should not be completed with current and accurate data.</1>
<1>A project, once created, is temporarily stored on our servers which are regularly cleaned.</1>
GENERAL TERMS OF USE OF THE AI ASSESSMENT TOOL

This document sets out the general terms of use (hereinafter referred to as the 'General Terms') of the AI Assessment Tool created and made available to the Federal Public Service Strategy and Support (hereinafter referred to as 'FPS BOSA') established within the WTC III, Bd Simon Bolivar 30/bte 1, 1000 Brussels for the benefit of users (also referred to as 'you').
You are invited to read these terms carefully before using the demonstration version or the downloadable version of the AI Assessment Tool (both hereinafter referred to as the 'Tool').
By using this Tool, you expressly accept these General Terms. If you do not agree with their content, we ask you not to continue using this Tool.
The information available via the Tool is general.

The Tool provides a factual analysis based on the responses you will enter in relation to the key elements mentioned in the guidelines of the high-level expert group on artificial intelligence for a given project. They are not suitable for personal or specific circumstances and therefore cannot be considered as personal, professional or legal advice. This Tool is not intended to offer a quality or compliance certification of an artificial intelligence system to European or national regulations.

The Tool is made available to you as is, without any warranty. The use of the Tool and the information it contains is therefore entirely at your own risk. FPS BOSA will not be liable for any damage suffered as a result of the use of the Tool.

FPS BOSA cannot in any case be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the Tool or the information provided. You are solely responsible for any damage to your computer system or any loss of data resulting from the download of information.
This version of the AI Assessment Tool is a demonstration version.

The version offered is intended to show the operation of the AI Assessment Tool by completing it with dummy data before allowing you to download it locally to your servers and securely include the data related to your project.

<unordedlist><listitem>used as a 'working version' where you complete your entire project. As our server capacity is limited, we will eliminate projects created in the demonstration version as we go along.</listitem><listitem>completed with current and accurate data.</listitem></unordedlist>
<titleSub>- Downloadable version locally on your servers</titleSub>
Once you have downloaded the Tool to your servers, you will be responsible for the use you make of it.
FPS BOSA grants you the right to use the Tool freely under the terms of the European Public License (EUPL):

To access the demonstration version, you must create an account on our site. For any information regarding the use and protection of your personal data, you are invited to consult our Privacy Statement.
Apart from the login data necessary to access the demonstration version, we urge you not to include personal data in the Tool. You are responsible for the data you enter in the Tool.
Since the downloadable version is stored locally on your servers, FPS BOSA has no control over the completed data.
The Tool, whether it is the demonstration or downloadable version, is made available to you free of charge under the terms of these conditions.
The demonstration version is made available to you for an indefinite period. FPS BOSA reserves the right to withdraw the possibility of using the demonstration version of the Tool at any time:

<unordedlist><listitem>If you do not comply with these General Terms.</listitem><listitem>If the Tool no longer complies with the current regulations on artificial intelligence.</listitem><listitem>For any convenience reason of FPS BOSA.</listitem><listitem>Due to a court decision.</listitem></unordedlist>

Due to legislative developments in this area and in particular the discussions regarding the adoption of the European Regulation on Artificial Intelligence, changes to the Tool may be required. We do not guarantee the continuous updating of the Tool.

FPS BOSA reserves the right to modify these General Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to regularly check the applicable conditions. These General Terms were last modified and revised on 9 January 2024.
These General Terms are governed by Belgian law.
By using the Tool, you agree that in the event of a dispute, only the courts of Brussels are competent.

If you would like to obtain additional information or if you would like to submit comments, you can contact FPS BOSA at the following address: Boulevard Simon Bolivar, 30 bte 1 1000 Brussels or by e-mail at the following address info@bosa.fgov.be
If you would like to file a complaint, you can submit it to the following e-mail address ai4belgium@bosa.fgov.be.
